name: Snakes&Ladders
description:
Casual Fun Game

2-4 players, you can even set CPU on all and watch !

At the start of the game, players are placed in the start area.

Players take it in turn to throw a die. In each subsequent turn the player moves a piece forward 1 to 6 squares as indicated by the die. If player cannot make a valid move then the die pass to the next player.

Player must throw exact number to advance to the finish square. The winner is the first to get onto the finish square.

Game is Mac Intel, works on M1
